name: Speed-Man ZERO
description:
Relive the original prototype, now recreated and adjusted using Clickteam Fusion 2.5! (Thanks Lory-FM for not releasing the prototype, you...)

You play as Speed-Man, who does the usual thing of collecting as many gems as possible, while avoiding enemies, in order to beat the high-score board.

It includes:

  • Downgraded graphics!
  • More levels than Speed-Man Deluxe.
  • An actual high-score board.

Controls:

  • WASD keys = Move the Player
  • Q - Show/Hide the Score UI in game
  • E - Pause the game

All rights reserved. Any unauthorized republishing of the software is strictly forbidden.
